job.title: Senior Data Scientist
job.description: <p>Leading Healthcare firm is looking for an Analytics Lead to assist in achieving business growth. This is a great opportunity to have a tremendous impact on client success by utilizing your analytic skills and applying business insights.</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;Responsibilities:&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><ul><li>Developing predictive models and test plans to support continuous improvement of campaign efforts using SAS/SQL/Python</li><li>Work closely with internal and external stakeholders to develop KPI frameworks, interactive dashboards to optimize direct marketing&nbsp;programs</li><li>Performing quantitative analysis to predict customer behavior as well as market mix modeling</li><li>Develop and deliver client presentations – including data analysis and written content</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Qualifications:</p><p><br></p><ul><li>6+ years of experience in a data-driven role </li><li>Advanced Excel experience; running statistical analysis and predictive models, developing financial models, running sensitivity analyses, automating tasks, etc.</li><li>SQL, SAS, Python or other programming language experience</li><li>Expertise with Tableau, Power BI, or other reporting/campaign management software</li></ul>
